name: Navy Battleship Strike: Warfare Combat Shooting
name_original: Navy Battleship Strike: Warfare Combat Shooting
description:
Navy Command Officer! There is a situation and you have been called to tackle the extreme dangerous navy gunship battle field operation that you have ever been assigned for in Navy Battleship Strike: Warfare Combat Shooting.
Your mission take down on your enemy’s fleet in the Open oceans on the great seas, by leading your naval battleship and destroying your enemy navy warships.
This is a navy war battleship shooting game with numerous types of military vessels, paratrooper commandos, fighter jets, gunship helicopters, and copters in the war game Navy Battleship Strike: Warfare Combat Shooting. Become a Navy seal commando in the world’s most challenging deep sea battle and take to the enemy warship in this nonstop action packed game! So get ready for deep sea action thrilling experience.
The enemy navy team has attacked and taken your critical naval base and with their leading air craft carrier, they are about to enter through sea water into your land. They have to be stopped before they enter and capture the motherland. Enemy is backed by the gunship helicopters and their Special Forces squad on battle ships in Navy Battleship Strike: Warfare Combat Shooting . Your men and team is waiting for your command and courage to stop and destroy the enemy navy fleet at all cost! You are only and last option to win the final battle!
